an10.74:1.1: “Dasahi, bhikkhave, vaddhihi vaddhamano ariyasavako ariyaya vaddhiya vaddhati, saradayi ca hoti varadayi kayassa.
an10.74:1.3: Khettavatthuhi vaddhati, dhanadhannena vaddhati, puttadarehi vaddhati, dasakammakaraporisehi vaddhati, catuppadehi vaddhati, saddhaya vaddhati, silena vaddhati, sutena vaddhati, cagena vaddhati, pannaya vaddhati—
an10.74:1.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi vaddhihi vaddhamano ariyasavako ariyaya vaddhiya vaddhati, saradayi ca hoti varadayi kayassati.
